text:
@BorisJohnson Why is that Boris? Is it perhaps because you, your advisors & cabinet have spectacularly messed up, causing thousands of deaths?

No, it’s your mess & we need opposition parties to hold YOU to account, they cannot do that if they are working with you @Keir_Starmer  #covid19
